name: Funkin' at Freddy's + Afton Full Week
summary: Funkin' at Freddy's is a mod we've made with a lot of passion and respect to the original series of Five Nights at Freddy's and contains 10 songs in its base-release, with six of these songs are unlocked through various means with varying visuals. If you get stuck with trying to figure out how to unlock characters take a peek at the strategy guide image that's included in the files.
